# Set up

Load libraries

```{r load_libs}
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(stringr)
# library(KrasAlleleCna)
devtools::load_all()
```

Establish path variables:

```{r make_paths}
pkg_dir <- system.file(package = "KrasAlleleCna")
extdata_dir <- system.file("extdata", package = "KrasAlleleCna")
data_dir <- system.file("data", package = "KrasAlleleCna")
```
